alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 10 at 10:21AM EDT until July 10 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of eastern New York, including the following areas, Northern Herkimer and Southern Herkimer. * WHEN...Through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Slow moving showers and thunderstorms containing locally very heavy rain will develop this afternoon and continue into this evening. Rainfall rates could reach up to one inch per hour, and lead to flash flooding where heaviest downpours persist. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued. Do not enter or cross flowing water or water of unknown depth.
